channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Bob And Penny Lord Present
channel.desc: While in Italy, Bob and Penny Lord recount the life of St. Clare of Montefalco, whose incorrupt body is venerated to this day. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Wild Goose
channel.desc: Fr. Dave Pivonka, TOR, reveals how all of our actions bear fruit that has both personal and eternal consequences. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Marriage: For Better...forever!
channel.desc: Marriage Counsler Greg Popcak Discusses how to resolve conflicts in a loving, supportive manner that is consistent with our Christian dignity. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: Raising teenagers is one of the toughest challenges facing parents today. Dr. Ray uses a powerful video to illustrate when and where parents should draw the line on verbal abuse. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Extraordinary The Bill Atkinson Story
channel.desc: In this powerful documentary, discover the incredible life and impact of Augustinian Friar, Fr. Bill Atkinson, who was the first quadriplegic priest in the Catholic Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford develops the Parable of the Good Samaritan as the motivation for a philosophy of life for a Christian. Seen from the perspective of how we use God's gifts, we are called to help others on our path - not ignore them. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Crossing The Goal
channel.desc: The guys show how it?s possible to be patient men of God. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Korea
channel.desc: In a country that suppressed Christianity, Andrew Kim and Paul Chong Hasang lost their lives preaching and evangelizing. This EWTN original program profiles the brave saints known as Korean martyrs. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Children, Behold Your Mother
channel.desc: A Rosary's meditation for Children. In studio with children conversation, meditation, singing and praying. (30 minutes).
